description: Enhanced bean types: added detailed variety characteristics including species, flavor profiles, origins, and quality indicators.

lookups.note: All fields except id and name are optional. Only one item per table can have is_default=true. Regions table includes additional country_id field as foreign key reference. Extended fields are specific to certain lookup types.

validation_rules.tasting_scores: Integer range 1-10 (sweetness, acidity, bitterness, body, aroma, flavor_profile_match, crema)
validation_rules.overall_scores: Float range 1.0-10.0 (brew_sessions.score, shots.score - overrides calculated score)
validation_rules.star_ratings: Float range 0.0-5.0 in 0.5 steps (products.rating, batches.rating - user star ratings)
validation_rules.arrays: Used for multi-valued foreign keys (bean_type_id, region_id)
validation_rules.audit_timestamps: Automatically managed ISO datetime strings in UTC
validation_rules.boolean_flags: is_active defaults to true, is_default defaults to false
validation_rules.default_constraints: Only one lookup item per table can have is_default=true

new_in_v1.2.audit_system: All entities automatically track created_at and updated_at timestamps
new_in_v1.2.batch_lifecycle: Added is_active flag to mark depleted or inactive batches
new_in_v1.2.favorites_system: Added is_default flag to lookup tables with automatic enforcement
new_in_v1.2.api_endpoints: Added /default, /set_default, /clear_default endpoints for all lookup types

new_in_v1.3.regions_separation: Regions moved to separate lookup table with country_id parent reference
new_in_v1.3.lookup_bug_fixes: Fixed country and decaf_method update_references to use ID fields instead of names
new_in_v1.3.region_management: Added inline region management in country edit pages

new_in_v1.4.espresso_support: Added shot and shot_session entities for espresso tracking
new_in_v1.4.unified_brewers: Brew methods now represent extraction methods; specific devices tracked via brewer lookup
new_in_v1.4.espresso_equipment: Added portafilter, basket, tamper, WDT tool, and leveling tool lookups
new_in_v1.4.shot_sessions: Shots can be grouped into sessions for dialing-in workflows
new_in_v1.4.extraction_status: Shots include extraction status tracking (channeling, over/under-extracted, perfect)
new_in_v1.4.crema_scoring: Added crema as additional taste score element for shots
new_in_v1.4.api_endpoints: Added /api/shots/*, /api/shot_sessions/*, and new equipment lookup endpoints

new_in_v1.5.schema_validation: Clarified scoring system rules for taste notes, overall scores, and star ratings
new_in_v1.5.shot_equipment: Added missing shot equipment fields: tamper_id, wdt_tool_id, leveling_tool_id
new_in_v1.5.validation_rules: Updated validation rules for consistent score handling across entities

new_in_v1.6.bean_process_multiselect: Converted bean_process from string to array of standardized processing methods
new_in_v1.6.standardized_processes: Defined standard process types: Washed (wet), Natural (dry), Honey, Semi-washed (wet-hulled), Anaerobic, Carbonic Maceration, Other
new_in_v1.6.data_migration: Automated migration of existing bean_process values to new multiselect format
new_in_v1.6.array_field: Products can now have multiple processing methods to support bean blends

new_in_v1.7.enhanced_bean_types: Added comprehensive variety characteristics for detailed coffee bean tracking
new_in_v1.7.species_classification: Added main_species field with arabica, robusta, liberica categories
new_in_v1.7.flavor_profiling: Added flavor_profile field for detailed variety taste descriptions
new_in_v1.7.origin_tracking: Added origin_region field to track variety geographical origins
new_in_v1.7.quality_indicators: Added cup_quality_potential field with exceptional/very_good/good/fair levels
new_in_v1.7.variety_enrichment: Enriched database with 19 specialty coffee varieties including Geisha, Robusta, Pacamara
new_in_v1.7.schema_validation: Updated bean_types schema with enum validation for new classification fields
new_in_v1.7.web_research: Populated varieties with current specialty coffee market data from 2024 sources
